supercell 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

supercell

The goal of supercell is to utilize the concept of superpixels to a variety of spatial data.

Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("Nowosad/spDataLarge")
remotes::install_github("Nowosad/supercell")

Example

library(supercell)
library(terra)
#> terra version 1.1.17
srtm = rast(system.file("raster/srtm.tif", package = "spDataLarge"))
plot(srtm)

srtm_slic = supercell(srtm, 23, 100, "euclidean")
plot(srtm)
plot(srtm_slic, add = TRUE, col = NA)
